TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit GridPattern/GridPatternInformation extends System.ValueType

summary.span: Fornisce accesso ai valori della proprietà dell'oggetto utilizzando le funzioni di accesso o .

span.span: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnCount As Integer
public: property int ColumnCount { int get(); };

summary.span: Ottiene il numero totale di colonne in una griglia.

span.span: Gets the number of columns in a grid.

value.span: Numero totale di colonne in una griglia.

span.span: The total number of columns in a grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Le righe e colonne, a seconda dell'implementazione di provider, possono essere caricate nel [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] ad albero e pertanto influenzare la e proprietà.Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, may be loaded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree and will therefore be reflected in the and properties. Se le righe e colonne nascoste non sono ancora state caricate non vengono contate.If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they are not counted. Il valore predefinito è 0.The default value is 0. ## Examples Nell'esempio seguente, un listener di eventi viene configurato per una modifica della struttura della griglia, ad esempio una riga o colonna della griglia elemento viene aggiunto o rimosso dalla griglia.In the following example, an event listener is set up for a grid structure change such as a row or column grid item being added or removed from the grid. [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#102)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RowCount As Integer
public: property int RowCount { int get(); };

summary.span: Ottiene il numero totale di righe in una griglia.

span.span: Gets the total number of rows in a grid.

value.span: Numero totale di righe in una griglia.

span.span: The total number of rows in a grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Le righe e colonne, a seconda dell'implementazione di provider, possono essere caricate nel [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] ad albero e pertanto influenzare la e proprietà.Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, may be loaded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree and will therefore be reflected in the and properties. Le righe e colonne nascoste non sono ancora state caricate non da contare.If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they will not be counted. Il valore predefinito è 0.The default value is 0. ## Examples Nell'esempio seguente, un listener di eventi viene configurato per una modifica della struttura della griglia, ad esempio una riga o colonna della griglia elemento viene aggiunto o rimosso dalla griglia.In the following example, an event listener is set up for a grid structure change such as a row or column grid item being added or removed from the grid. [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#102)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#101)]
